name: Puke the Pirate: Rebarfed
storyline:
Puke the Pirate has found a treasure map belonging to the dreaded pirate, Black Barf!
Help him to run, jump, puke & fart-fly his way through many levels of adventure! Collect as much of Black Barf's treasure as you can, while avoiding an assortment of wild enemies & deadly dangers!
At the end of each level, search for a treasure map that will lead you to your next exciting location!
Afterward, you can use it to wipe your mouth & butt... hopefully, in that order!
summary:
The grossest pirate is back with a brand new remake of Puke the Pirate!
Revisit Spatter Island and collect as much of Black Barf's treasure as you can!
